query: What is the capital of the United States?

documents.Title: Facts about Carson City
documents.Content: Carson City is the capital city of the American state of Nevada.

documents.Title: North Dakota
documents.Content: North Dakota is a state in the United States. 672,591 people lived in North Dakota in the year 2010. The capital and seat of government is Bismarck.

documents.Title: Micronesia
documents.Content: Micronesia, officially the Federated States of Micronesia, is an island nation in the Pacific Ocean, northeast of Papua New Guinea. The country is a sovereign state in free association with the United States. The capital city of Federated States of Micronesia is Palikir.

documents.Title: Capital of America
documents.Content: Washington, D.C. (also known as simply Washington or D.C., and officially as the District of Columbia) is the capital of the United States. It is a federal district. The President of the USA and many major national government offices are in the territory. This makes it the political center of the United States of America

documents.Title: Death Penalty in America
documents.Content: Capital punishment (the death penalty) has existed in the United States since before the United States was a country. As of 2017, capital punishment is legal in 30 of the 50 states. The federal government (including the United States military) also uses capital punishment.
